function.name: get_fit_elv_stat
function.syntax: int get_fit_elv_stat(int fnum, int channel, int channel_fix, int old, double stime, double sdate, double etime, double edate, double extime, unsigned char fitflg, unsigned char nsflg, unsigned char vb, char *vbuf, char *iname, char **dnames);

description.p: The get_fit_elv_stat function takes the input parameters needed to load cfit, fit, or fitacf files and determine the number of potentially valid elevation angles.

function.returns: Returns the number of potentially valid elevation angles.
function.errors: Returns (-1) if an error is encountered.
